name: Bandit
text: Major: Deal 4 Physical damage to an adjacent target

name: Bandit Soldier
text: Major: Deal 5 Physical damage to an adjacent target\n\nMinor: Block

name: Bandit Slinger
text: Major: Deal 3 Physical damage to a target\n\nMajor(1): Deal 5 fire damage to a target, and 3 fire damage to each enemy adjacent to that target

name: Bandit Captain
text: Major: Deal 6 Physical damage to an adjacent target\n\nMinor: Other Ally Bandits deal +1 damage until your next turn.

name: Bandit Lord
text: Major: Deal 7 Physical damage to an adjacent target\n\nMinor: Summon a Bandit Soldier or Bandit Slinger
